Sentencas: This study simulated a triple combined cycle which combines a gas turbine combined cycle (GTCC) and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system, and the expected performance is presented.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The impact of post-combustion carbon capture was also evaluated.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: Commercially available F-class and J-class gas turbines were considered, which represent the present technology standard and an emerging technology.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: A state-of-the-art post-combustion carbon capture technology was used.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The analysis showed that the efficiency of the triple combined cycle is a weak function of the gas turbine class.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The efficiency of the F-class-based system without carbon capture is slightly over 70%, and that of the J-class-based system is slightly lower.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The efficiency penalty due to carbon capture is around 5 percentage points in the triple combined cycle.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The power share of the gas and steam turbines increases with increasing turbine inlet temperature, reaching more than half in the J-class-based system.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The degree of increase required for the turbine annulus area to operate the gas turbine safely without compressor surge problems was estimated.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture

Sentencas: The relative efficiency reduction due to an increase in carbon capture rate is lower in the triple combined cycle compared to the GTCC.
Titulo: Performance of a triple power generation cycle combining gas/steam turbine combined cycle and solid oxide fuel cell and the influence of carbon capture
